    • Method Detail

      • getNextMessageSink

        public MessageSink getNextMessageSink()
        Returns null.

        MessageDispatch has a map of "next" sinks based on what type of messages come in.

        Specified by:
        getNextMessageSink in interface MessageSink

      • processMessage

        public Message processMessage(Message message)
        If any message sink is associated with the type of message received, processMessage(edu.asu.ying.mapreduce.rpc.messaging.Message) passes the message to it.
        Specified by:
        processMessage in interface MessageSink
        Parameters:
        message - the message to process.
        Returns:
        the result from the sink, or null if no sink is registered.

      • registerSink

        public void registerSink(java.lang.Class<? extends Message> messageClass,
                MessageSink sink)
        Allows a MessageSink to be registered to receive messages of a certain type.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the class of messages the message sink wants to receive
        sink - the message sink to receive messages
